name: example
description: Collection of visualization tools and UI for the WeaveJS project.

scripts.clean: rimraf index.js && rimraf index.jsx && rimraf dist/bundle.js && rimraf node_modules/weavejs
scripts.compile: npm run clean && npm install weavejs && npm run copy-typings && tsc && npm run babel && npm run browserify && node copy

author: WeaveTeam <devteam@iweave.com>
